sen.j: 土御門 晴親（つちみかど はれちか、天明7年12月8日 (旧暦)（1788年1月15日） - 天保13年6月28日 (旧暦)（1842年8月4日）は江戸時代後期の公卿。
sen.e: Harechika TSUCHIMIKADO (January 15, 1788 - August 4, 1842) was kugyo (high court noble) in the late Edo period.
Harechika TSUCHIMIKADO (January 15, 1788 - August 4, 1842) was a Court noble who lived during the late Edo period.
sen.cmt: 公卿を Court nobleとし、また 用語統一の「レビュー結果」（2009/7/31）に従い、inの部分を who lived duringに修正致しました。
sen.e: Harechika TSUCHIMIKADO (January 15, 1788 - August 4, 1842) was a Court noble who lived during the late Edo period.
His father was Yasuhide TSUCHIMIKADO.
His father was Yasuhide TSUCHIMIKADO.
His father was Yasuhide TSUCHIMIKADO.

sen.j: 子女は土御門晴雄、土御門藤子ら。
sen.e: He had children including Haruo TSUCHIMIKADO and Fujiko TSUCHIMIKADO.
His children included Haruo TSUCHIMIKADO and Fujiko TSUCHIMIKADO.
sen.cmt: 文頭の表現を修正致しました。
sen.e: His children included Haruo TSUCHIMIKADO and Fujiko TSUCHIMIKADO.
His court official rank was Shonii (Senior Second Rank).
His court official rank was Shonii (Senior Second Rank).
His court official rank was Shonii (Senior Second Rank).
He was Hisangi (advisors at large).
He remained a Hisangi (advisors at large).
sen.cmt: 朝儀に参与しない職として、remainedと致しました。
sen.e: He remained a Hisangi (advisors at large).
He was an Onmyoji (Master of Yin yang).
He was an Onmyoji (Master of Yin yang).
He was an Onmyoji (Master of Yin yang).
He served in Onmyoryo (Bureau of Divination).
He served in Onmyoryo (Bureau of Divination).
He served in Onmyoryo (Bureau of Divination).

sen.j: 土御門泰栄の子として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born to Yasuhide TSUCHIMIKADO.
He was born to Yasuhide TSUCHIMIKADO.
He was born to Yasuhide TSUCHIMIKADO.

sen.j: 文政3年（1820年）12月21日 (旧暦)叙従三位。
sen.e: He was promoted to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) on December 21, 1820.
He rose to the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) on January 24, 1821 (December 21, 1820 in old lunar calendar).
sen.cmt: 位が上がったため rose to に変え、日付を新暦に修正致しました。また、新暦ですと年をまたぐため、「用語統一 2010/1/21 月の表記の仕方」に従い()内に情報を追記致しました。
sen.e: He rose to the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) on January 24, 1821 (December 21, 1820 in old lunar calendar).
He died in 1842.
He died in 1842.
He died in 1842.
